modName: Ancient Nord Armor and Saviors Hide CBBEv3 Echo
summary: A remesh of Ancient Nord Armor and Savior\'s Hide for CBBE v3.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pCCVm.png[/IMG]
I made some modifications to the vanilla Ancient Nord Armor and Savior\'s Hide armor for CBBE v3.  I also modified the CBBE v3 body.  For Savior\'s Hide, I was attempting to make the armor somewhat like a corset. 

These are simple replacers for the vanilla meshes.  I haven\'t used the construction kit yet but may add stand alone versions later.

This is my first Skyrim mod.  It was a way to learn and practice editing models in 3DS Max and Nifskope, so if there are any errors or conflicts let me know.  There are some known issues, which I will outline below.  I will update as I iron out the issues.  Depending on how this goes I may edit some other vanilla meshes similarly.  I\'m open to ideas but I am very much a novice at this and will probably only edit vanilla armors and clothes.    

[center]Please check out my Falmer Darkseeker Armor, Thieves Guild Duelist Armor, and Field Mage Outfit, all for CBBE v3.[/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11963]Falmer Darkseeker Armor CBBE v3[/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13646]Thieves Guild Duelist Armor CBBE v3[/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14198]Field Mage Outfit CBBE v3[/url][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RollK.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Z7yeG.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ePssp.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/51eVt.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/G1OOs.jpg[/IMG][/center]


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xtr5j.png[/IMG]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Caliente\'s Female Body Mod[/url]
- CBBE v3 Compatible Texture (I use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554]Navetsea\'s[/url]) 
- Optional: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1710]Winter White Saviors Hide by Kirkieball[/url]


Required for the Game Saves
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1329]Beauty Faces for Females[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=124]Press out the Wrinkles v3[/url] 


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0v4Qu.png[/IMG]
  Savior\'s Hide:
  - Open the archive
  - Copy the Meshes folder to the Meshes folder in Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
  - Copy the Textures folder to the Textures folder in Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
  - Select \"Yes\" when prompted

  Ancient Nord: 
  - Open the archive
  - Copy the Meshes folder to the Meshes folder in Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
  - Copy the Textures folder to the Textures folder in Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
  - Select \"Yes\" when prompted


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/e2ur9.png[/IMG]
- clipping on the back lower fur when the weight slider is at or near max (Saviors Hide).
- neck seam issues (Saviors Hide, especially for max weight)
- some minor bone weighting issues, and clipping when sneaking (Ancient Nord)


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WQcge.png[/IMG]
Caliente - CBBE is an incredible work of art and I very much appreciate Caliente\'s dedication and generosity to the Skyrim community. I was apprehensive altering with the mesh. Hopefully I didn\'t mess it up to much.

Layer Bikini by Anano - The underwear comes from this fantastic mod.  Check out Anano\'s mod, its excellent work. 

Bethesda - Creating a great game and encouraging us to add something of our own to it.


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hQUqJ.png[/IMG]
To CherryHotaling for an excellent and thorough 3DS Max and Nifskope tutorial on armor conversions.  
Officebeardontcare for a great youtube video tutorial.  
And Axeface and Ghogiel for some insight when I ran into an export problem.   
MxR for featuring my mods on Skyrim Mods Weekly.
Saiodin for featuring my mods on Skyrim Mods Series.

[center]Saviors Hide mentioned on Skyrim Mods Weekly[/center]

[center][youtube]85TZDhY2W2g[/youtube][/center]
author: echo 1162
